excerpt: Satisfying and delicious vegan recipe that can be made in just 20 minutes!
instructions: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add onion and garlic to the skillet and saut√© for 2-3 minutes until the onion is translucent.
Add turmeric, cumin, coriander, and red pepper flakes to the skillet. Stir to coat the onion and garlic with the spice mixture.
Add chickpeas, tomatoes, and coconut milk to the skillet. Stir to combine.
Reduce heat to low and let the chickpea curry simmer for 5-10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Garnish with fresh cilantro before serving.
